comment1: This is the puzzle data for a test puzzle
name: Test Puzzle
dialog:
Each dog owner has a name and owns one dog. Each dog has a name 
and is an unique breed. The years represent when the owner first 
aquired the dog.
clue1: Anita bought Riley in 2008 and he is a Beagle.
clue2: Barbara adopted Samson in 2006 and he is a Great Dane.
clue3: Douglas found Shadow in 2009 and she is a Bulldog.
clue4: Fernando bought Max, a Chow Chow, in 2007.
clue5: Ginger had Molly the Maltese, since 2010.
